## Matrix.OrthoLHToRef() method

Store a left-handed orthographic projection to a given matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static OrthoLHToRef(width: number, height: number, znear: number, zfar: number, result: Matrix): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | <code>number</code> | defines the viewport width |
|  height | <code>number</code> | defines the viewport height |
|  znear | <code>number</code> | defines the near clip plane |
|  zfar | <code>number</code> | defines the far clip plane |
|  result | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the target matrix |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
